gameConsoleTest

Class testConnectedContinents

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameConsoleTest.testConnectedContinents

  • public class testConnectedContinents
extends java.lang.Object
    Check if all the continents are accessible from any other continent. Also check if a continent is a connected subgraph
    Author:
    Yann Kerichard, Yueshuai Jiang, Che-Shao Chen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void before()
      The value setting for connected graph test
      void testConnected()
      test when all continents are connected together 4-3-1-2
      void testConnectedButNotAllReachableContinents()
      test following country (so continent) connections : 1-2 3-4 Each continent have a link to an other continent, all continents are not reachable
      void testConnectedSubgraph()
      test when a continent is a connected subgraph 1 country in each continent
      void testConnectedSubgraphWithManyCountry()
      test when a continent is a connected subgraph many countries in each continent countries 1,3 in continent 1 countries 2,4 in continent 2
      void testNotConnected()
      Continent 1---Continent 2---Continent 4 continent 3 is not connected to the rest of the world
      void testNotConnectedSubgraph()
      test when a continent is not a connected subgraph countries 1,3 in continent 1 countries 2,4 in continent 2 but 2 and 4 not connected
